briefTitle: Trial of Lymphoseek in Intraoperative Localization of Lymph Nodes in Breast Cancer and Melanoma

outcomeMeasures.title: Concordance of Blue Dye and Lymphoseek
outcomeMeasures.description: The proportion of lymph nodes detected intraoperatively by blue dye that were also detected by Lymphoseek.

outcomeMeasures.title: Reverse Concordance of Blue Dye and Lymphoseek
outcomeMeasures.description: The proportion of lymph nodes detected intraoperatively by Lymphoseek that were also detected by blue dye.
